review: I like the fire stick but it is too slow. I also have a roku and it is much faster. I wish I would have just bought the fire tv instead. It does have more storage then the roku and it has a bunch of games. The roku had hardly any games and the games are not very good. I would have given the fire stick 5 stars if it would work faster and cut out less. Nothing more annoying than a movie having to reload every five minutes. And no it is not my internet because I have several other devices that I watch movies on and it is not an issue. It also takes forever to download apps.
author: shopper mom

review: Wasn't sure if this was exactly what I was looking for. However, once I received and installed it, I couldn't be happier.  Seeing I am already a Prime Member, being able to watch movies and tv shows is wonderful. Super easy to install.  Automatically connected to my Wi-Fi.I would definitely recommend the Fire TV Stick.
author: Debora "Mandy"

review: Easy to use,gives you so many more viewing options, and reasonable price!
author: rivertree

review: It is an amazing product from Amazon. Total value for money. I really liked the product and would recommend it to everyone.
author: Himanshu

review: Can I not search Netflix for a movie? Pretty crappy if I can't

review: Hardly has any available channels.  Get a Roku!  Much better option.

review: Easy to set up and seems to work well.
